attributes.action: have a reforendom on the Lisbon Treaty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: for over 30 years, this country has not had a reforendom. i believe that there should be a reforendom on the lisbon treaty. this is because britain was supposed to have a reforendom on the European constitution. as it is basically based on the same principal and all that has mainly been chainged is the title, it is a good reason to have a reforendom on this issue

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
